modName: Dx's Follower Pack - Real People - SAM - SOS - Better males
summary:
This Pack contains (for now) two Followers who are based on real friends of mine.
I worked hard on them, making them look as clsoe as possible to the Originals. :)
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wdJb9f9.png[/img]

Height: 1.01

[color=#cc0000]Side Note - The Mod only containes Face Textures which look the best with the "required" Mods. They surly will work with other Bodies aswell, like Vanilla. :) [/color]
